item.content:encoded:
Dec 27

Fifth Press Conference
  • Held on October 4th
  • Confirmed there are victims of spiritual sales by “Unification Church,” but its numbers are “very small.”
  • Require receipt for donations over 30% of monthly salary

At this conference, the church changed its statement about spiritual sales. They confirmed there are “very little numbers” of spiritual sales cases because the National Consumer Affairs of Japan announced there are cases related to spiritual sales by “Unification Church.” Also, they revealed a newly established standard for donation, which is 30% of the monthly salary. They also introduced “Family Counselors” who help pious families.

Fifth Press Conference (10/4): news article

“【解説】「旧統一教会」が5回目の会見…献金継続を宣言『月収３割まで搾り取られるおそれ』消費生活センターに教会関係者「相談内容を教えて」と問い合わせ…元信者のジャーナリスト「トップダウンで組織的に動いている証拠」: TBS News Dig (1ページ).” TBS NEWS DIG. TOKYO BROADCASTING SYSTEM TELEVISION, INC, October 5, 2022. https://newsdig.tbs.co.jp/articles/-/171184?display=1.

Fifth Press Conference (10/4): video

Sixth Press Conference
  • Held on October 20th
  • Announced its attitude against “Requesting Reports and Asking Questions” based on Religious Corporations Act Article 78-2
  • Show up 20 of “second generations” who were promoted to “district leaders” (out of 68 seats)

Sixth Press Conference (10/20): news article

“「反省のかけらも感じないひどい会見、全体の紛争を矮小化している」　旧統一教会6度目の会見　元2世信者は二転三転の政府をどう見たか　紀藤正樹弁護士の解説: 特集: 報道ランナー: ニュース: 関西テレビ放送 カンテレ.” 報道ランナー | ニュース. Kansai Television Co. Ltd., October 20, 2022. https://www.ktv.jp/news/feature/221020-1/.

Sixth Press Conference (10/20): video

Religious Corporations Act 78-2

Religious Corporations Act, Article 78-2, Japanese National Diet. Last modified 2006.

item.content:encoded:
Dec 26

Third Press Conference
  • Held on September 22nd, about half an hour
  • Announcement of “the headquarters for Church Reform” and claim their innocence for spiritual sales.
  • The counterargument for the newly proposed “anti-sect” bill in the Japanese parliament

In the conference, the church again claimed their innocence for the spiritual sales and justified their pious members’ “immoderate donation.”

Also, they talked about the “anti-Japaneseness” of their doctrine and their relationships with North Korea. As an opinion, they mentioned how Sun Myung Moon worked for Japan by helping to pass the anti-spying bill. Later they added they never sent money to North Korea.

Third Press Conference (9/22): script

“【全文ノーカット】「宗教として尊敬と信頼を」「2009年以降 ‘霊感商法‘1件もない」旧統一教会が「教会改革推進本部」設置　会見で何を語ったか: TBS News Dig (1ページ).” TBS NEWS DIG. TOKYO BROADCASTING SYSTEM TELEVISION, INC., September 23, 2022. https://newsdig.tbs.co.jp/articles/-/160821?display=1.

Forth Press Conference
  • Held on September 29th, a short conference
  • Announcement of the lawsuit about “defamation” against “Unification Church” by TV shows

Norishige Kondo (近藤 徳茂), Deputy Director of the General Affairs Bureau of “Unification Church,” said, “followers of the church are suffering due to biased reports.” Syuya Fukumoto (福本 修也), the lawyer and pious follower of “Unification Church,” insisted that “we will stand firmly against these reports.”

Forth Press Conference (9/29): news article

“旧統一教会、民放と弁護士提訴　情報番組で発言「名誉毀損」―東京地裁：時事ドットコム.” 時事ドットコム. Jiji Press Ltd., September 29, 2022. https://www.jiji.com/jc/article?k=2022092900862&g=soc.

the article reports the relationships between the “Unification Church” and North Korean (Japanese)

item.content:encoded:
Dec 25

As I did yesterday, I would like to continue to catch up on the current situation of “Unification Church” related issues in Japan. For today, I am going to focus on the press conferences and the announcements by the Church. It is a rare opportunity for us to grasp what they perceive and think about the problem, especially related to the “second generation.”

First Press Conference
  • Held on July 11th, about an hour
  • Describe the official view of Mr. Abe’s assassination of the Church

They excused themselves by explaining their doctrine and claimed their innocence for the assassination.

First Press Conference (7/11): script

Yokoyama, Kotaro, and Rio Nishiyama, eds. “旧・統一教会が会見｢動機だとすれば重く受け止める｣田中会長が語る【会見全文】.” BUSINESS INSIDER JAPAN. BUSINESS INSIDER JAPAN, July 29, 2022. https://www.businessinsider.jp/post-256503.

Second Press Conference
  • Held on August 10th, about an hour
  • Their claim for spiritual sales and their political activities

At the press conference, the president of the Japanese “Unification Church,” Tomihiro Tanaka, made it clear that they are no more committing to spiritual sales, which was once a social problem in Japan about 40 years ago. He also resorted to the Church getting unreasonable discrimination and hatred rooted in “biased reporting” by the media. He said the current environment surrounding the Church violates freedom of religion.

When he talked about “biased coverage,” he pointed out that the media only convey the thoughts of “ex-Moonies” while omitting the viewpoints or “success stories” of pious Moonies.

Second Press Conference (8/10): script

“【全文ノーカット】旧統一教会・田中富広会長会見「政治的介入や不正はない」: TBS News Dig (1ページ).” TBS NEWS DIG. TOKYO BROADCASTING SYSTEM TELEVISION, INC.　, August 10, 2022. https://newsdig.tbs.co.jp/articles/-/120753?display=1.
